thread.title: Recipe: Grilled Fish with Ginger Sauce
thread.title_full: Recipe: Grilled Fish with Ginger Sauce

title: Recipe: Grilled Fish with Ginger Sauce
text:
2 pinches powdered black pepper How to make Grilled Fish with Ginger Sauce Step 1 
Combine the lime juice, salt and pepper. Add the fish fillets and coat well. Step 2 
Sprinkle the dill leaves on top, cover the fillets and keep them in fridge for about 3 hours. Step 3 
Remove the fish from the fridge and keep aside. Step 4 
Heat 1/2 tblsp oil in a pan over moderate flame. Step 5 
Add the sliced ginger, small onions, chillies and lemongrass. Saute for 30 to 40 seconds. Step 6 
Add the fish sauce, sugar, wine and vinegar. Cook for a minute and add the spring onions. Step 7 
Add the chicken stock and simmer for 5 minutes. Switch off the flame. Step 8 
Combine the sesame oil with the remaining vegetable oil. Step 9 
Brush the fish fillets with this and place it on a preheated grill. Step 10 
Grill for 4 minutes on one side and turn over. Cook till the fish is done. Step 11 
Remove and transfer to a serving plate. Pour the sauce on top. Step 12
